text: Fikile April Mbalula (born 8 April 1971 in the Free State) is a South African politician and is the 17th Secretary-General of the African National Congress (ANC). He is also a former Minister of Transport (South Africa).'I was not a good manâ€š' says Mbalula Times Live| ANC confirms Fikile Mbalula's new job | IOL News Mbalula also serves as President of the African National Congress Youth League.| African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL) Timeline 1944-2011 | South African History Online == Career == Mbalula was appointed deputy police minister in Jacob Zuma's cabinet in 2009. In 2011, he was promoted to minister of Sports and Recreation.| Fikile Mbalula - Deputy Minister of Police | SAnews == References == Category:South African politicians Category:Living people Category:1971 births
title: Fikile Mbalula
